Package supermarket.domain.relations

Class Relations

java.lang.Object
supermarket.domain.relations.Relations
Direct Known Subclasses:
RelationsTickets
public class Relations extends Object
Class representing the relations between products.

    • Relations

      public Relations(ProductController productController, float[][] relationMatrix, ArrayList<Integer> barcodes)
      Constructor of Relations class to use for the manual version.
      Parameters:
      productController - Product controller of the relation.
      relationMatrix - Matrix to read.
      barcodes - Barcodes that the user has introduced with a certain order.

  • Method Details

    • getRelationMatrix

      public float[][] getRelationMatrix(ArrayList<Integer> barcodes)
      Fills relationMatrix with values from the relation map.
      Parameters:
      barcodes - Order to follow in the matrix (barcodes[0] goes to matrix[0][...].
      Returns:
      Returns matrix with the correct values.

    • getRelationMatrix

      public float[][] getRelationMatrix(Set<Integer> barcodes)
      Gets relationMatrix.
      Parameters:
      barcodes - Order to follow from the user.
      Returns:
      Returns the correct matrix with values.

    • readMatrix

      public void readMatrix(float[][] relationMatrix, ArrayList<Integer> barcodes)
      Reads matrix and puts values into relations map.
      Parameters:
      relationMatrix - Matrix with the relations values.
      barcodes - Barcodes of the products with relations.

    • modify

      public void modify(int barcode1, int barcode2, float newValue)
      Modifies relation between two products
      Parameters:
      barcode1 - First product.
      barcode2 - Second product.
      newValue - New value into the relation.

    • delete

      public void delete(int barcode)
      Deletes relations with a given barcode.
      Parameters:
      barcode - Barcode of the product.
